      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of Mulan classifier. The XML labels supported are:
        • classifier type= class

          Package:

          mulan.classifier

          Class: All

          If the defined classifier is instance of mulan.classifier.transformation, then a base-classifier must be configured
          • base-classifier type= class All weka classifier are supported
